level.heading: COMMISSION PROCEEDINGS FOR REVIEW OF NEGOTIATED AGREEMENTS (ยง 15-2604) Within ninety (90) calendar days of the date that a negotiated agreement isiled with the Commission, the Commission shall either approve or reject theegotiated agreement, or any portion thereof, in accordance with the standardset forth in 47 U.S.C. ยง 252(e)(2). The Commission shall make written findingss to any deficiencies in the negotiated agreement if the negotiated agreements rejected.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000)EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8315 (October 20,000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
